Comment: >In the targeting of academic institutions, nonprofits, and law firms, the administration has been just as open about the fact that it will bring the weight of the federal government down to bear on those that are advancing oppositional or even just disfavored political agendas. It doesn’t take much imagination to tease out what form this obsession with regulating acceptable speech and political organizing could take if the Trump team could, with a few keystrokes, pull up a person’s health records, tax records, business associations, registrations, and so on.  My personal Red Line for staying in this country is the establishment of some sort of a social credit score.  I think my wife still doesn't believe it's possible but shit like this says to me they would very much like to do this in one form another.
Author: campelm
